title: Digital Wellbeing widget rolling out to quickly show your screen time & most used apps [U]
content:
Following new widgets for YouTube Music and Google Photos in December, Digital Wellbeing will soon get a screen time widget that shows how much you’ve been on your phone and the top Android apps being used.

more…

The post Digital Wellbeing widget rolling out to quickly show your screen time & most used apps [U] appeared first on 9to5Google.
